Text: this game is real or fake ?please answer, then i download it.

This game is real. 

I loaded it using CFW 5.00 M33-6 without actually needing a Popsloader package installed. But if you have trouble loading it just use pops loader pack and pops 3.72.

The actual Popsloader package for 5.00 m33-6 can be found here... http://www.filecrop.com/popsloader-for-5.00-m33-6.html
will this work on psp 5.50 gen-b with a pops lader up to 4.01
the game screen is very small is there any way to make it bigger while playing?
if u want change screen mode press the button with ps logo than go to the other settings than change screen mode to full screen
